title: Coloured bubbles of hell in chrome
content: Hey can someone at google explain these popped up yesterday coloured bubbles I've attached the screenshots is it possible to turn them off is it possible to change the colour of these bubbles my main problem is that I'm bilaterally photo sensitive and these f***ing bubbles are causing SEIZURES for me well done google they are pattern glare for me thank you for complete lack of common sense from you thank you for the SEIZURES idiots
